entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
